sentences.en: a meeting covering many disparate subjects
sentences.cn: 涉及许多不同议题的会议

sentences.en: And don't ply foreigners with lots and lots of disparate questions.
sentences.cn: 不要没完没了地向老外提出大量的互不相关的问题.

sentences.en: Chalk and cheese are disparate substances.
sentences.cn: 粉笔和乳酪是完全不同的东西.

sentences.en: It's the collision of disparate ideas that alters one's perspective.
sentences.cn: 是迥然不同的观点之间的碰撞改变了人们的看法。

sentences.en: Its elements are as disparate as his sentences.
sentences.cn: 它的要素五花八门,和他的文句一样.

sentences.en: Professor Minerva McGonagall's name comes from two rather disparate sources.
sentences.cn: 米勒娃·麦格教授的名字来自于两个迥然不同的来源.

sentences.en: Scientists are trying to pull together disparate ideas in astronomy.
sentences.cn: 科学家们正试图将天文学中的各派观点整合在一起。

sentences.en: Specific to disparate industry, influence degree each are not identical.
sentences.cn: 具体到不同的行业, 影响程度各不相同.

sentences.en: the difficulties of dealing with disparate groups of people
sentences.cn: 和不同的人群打交道的难处

sentences.en: The Europeans were far more troubled by the disparate states of arithmetic and geometry.
sentences.cn: 欧洲人对算术和几何的不同情况是伤过很多脑筋的.

sentences.en: The industry with forestall and disparate competition has different market structure.
sentences.cn: 垄断与竞争不同的产业有不同的市场结构.

sentences.en: The recession has created an atmosphere where disparate groups fraternise in an atmosphere of mutual support.
sentences.cn: 大萧条使得不同集团在友爱互助的气氛中如兄弟般亲密往来。

sentences.en: The stationmaster beside me each skeletal Qing Ji, disposition are disparate.
sentences.cn: 我身边的站长各个骨骼清奇 、 性格迥异.

sentences.en: These disparate feelings narrate a paragraph of dramatic aesthetic history.
sentences.cn: 这些迥异的感觉便叙说了一段生动的审美变迁史.

sentences.en: This couple of seemingly disparate topics have something in common.
sentences.cn: 这两个看似无关的主题其实有些相同之处.

sentences.en: With 31 provinces, the pension system is a maze of disparate rules.
sentences.cn: 现在的31个省, 退休金体系千差万别.

words.tran_cn: 不同的；不相干的；全异的

trans.tran_cn: 完全不同的，从根本上种类有区分或不同的
trans.tran_en: consisting of things or people that are very different and not related to each other
